ARTICLE.TITLE: Independence Day Celebrations 2020 LIVE Updates: Atma Nirbhar, strong resolve main themes of PM Modi’s speech

METADATA.headline: Independence Day 2020 LIVE Updates: Atma Nirbhar, strong resolve main themes of PM Modi’s speech
METADATA.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has unfurled the tricolour and is addressing the nation from the ramparts of the Red Fort, to mark India's 74th Independence Day. This year's ‘I-Day' celebrations have been overshadowed by the pandemic.
METADATA.news_keywords: independence day 2020, 74th independence day of india, independence day 2020 live updates, prime minister narendra modi's independence day speech, pm modi speech live, independence day ceremony, independence day speech time, defence ministry, red fort, 15 august independence day, independence day 2020 images, independence day 2020 theme, independence day preparations, list of honorary commission independence day 2020
